item.title: English Learning Notes From Culips
item.description: Here is the podcast, I take some notes from it, it's really helpful if you try to leaning English. I recommand you that listen the podcast yourself multiple times. What the Mass Immersion Approach is learning 3 to 6 hours a day, and listen in background when cooking, cleaning. Compare
